summary: This document is a mortgage loan application correspondence addressed to Brian Vickers from Joann Brown, a Mortgage Loan Originator. It includes a request for Vickers to review enclosed documents related to his mortgage application and provides contact information for further inquiries.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the recipient of the mortgage loan application correspondence and is requested to review the enclosed documents.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is the sender of the correspondence, providing assistance regarding the mortgage loan application process.

keyFacts: The document is a mortgage loan application correspondence dated December 8, 2014.
Brian Vickers is the applicant for the mortgage loan.
Joann Brown is the Mortgage Loan Originator who sent the correspondence.
The document mentions that loans are subject to credit review and approval.
The correspondence includes a request for Vickers to review enclosed documents related to his application.
